name: pf2ools-schema

scripts.build: npm i && npm run -s generate && node -e "process.stdout.write('Cleaning files... ')" && npm run -s clean && node -p "'Done'"
scripts.generate: npm run generate:clear && npm run generate:zod && node -e "process.stdout.write('Compiling Typescript... ')" && tsc && node -p "'Done'" && npm run generate:schema
scripts.generate:zod: npm run -s generate:zod:combinedTypes && npm run -s generate:zod:index

author: The Pf2ools project
description: The Pf2ools ecosystem's schema for representing Pathfinder 2nd Edition game data as JSON.
